data.description:
Meet with Friends and Family in real Hoppin' Destinations, 360 video chatrooms, using your Oculus avatar. Follow your host or lead the way. When you like where you're at, send yourself some information about the Hoppin' place by email.
Activities, culture, events, landmarks or touristic locations can benefit from this unique opportunity to welcome potential visitors onsite. Contact us through hoppin.world to participate in the media revolution.
Creators, producers, studios or 360 capture enthusiasts earn commissions when referring their favorite destinations and posting their amazing experiences. Once approved and published, they automatically become official Hoppin' creators, and we'll send their way anyone who asks about immersive content production in their region.
Enjoy!

changelog.change_log: Release 1.9.0, Create conference room and experiences with static image
Release 1.8.0, Fix many bugs to provide a better social experience
Release 1.7.0, Ask and give the guide, force your friends to follow you, multi bugs and optimization
Release 1.6.1, Fix bug when the user try to join a private channel
Release 1.6.0, Improve multi access and menu performance
Release 1.5.0, Maze with more features, fix avatar glitchs and drop fps on the menu
Release 1.4.0, Room instance to accept more users

What's new in Hoppin' 1.3
- Hoppin’ is setting the basis to welcome a larger number of visitors in the context of the Covid-19 crisis.
-A News section has been enabled at the top of the Destinations Feed where we’ll be able to notify you, our users, with timely information.
-You, can always contact us through contact@hoppin.world.
-Hoppin’s interface language now adapts to that of the headset when in French, with Spanish coming soon.
-You’ll notice some new experiences from a studio in Pittsburgh, with more ready to be released.
-Know of Destinations which should be on Hoppin’? Let us know and get a revshare.
-As always, tell us what you think about Hoppin’ releases, let us know what you'd like to see next on feedback@hoppin.world, and help us with a good review on the Oculus Store!
- Keep Hoppin' and stay tuned for more shortly!
Release Candidate for Launch Update, fixing logs timestamp
Adjusted Release Candidate after First Review
